content: निष्पेषः, निष्पेषणं {@--1@} Rubbing together, grinding, bruising, pulverizing; भुजांतरनिष्पेष <ls>Ve. 3</ls>, <ls>Māl. 8. 9.</ls> <ls n="Māl.">3.</ls> {@--2@} Striking, clashing, hitting against, friction; <ls>R. 4. 77.</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 34</ls>; <ls>K. 56.</ls> {@--3@} The sound produced by striking or clashing.
